name: Investigator (itch)
description:
Ever wondered what it is like to be a reporter? Well this simulation is your big break! The Daily Tree, the local newspaper where you're interning, sent you out to cover a robbery in a local neighborhood. Interview A police officer, the victim and potential suspects. You may even get a promotion if you can figure out who the robber is.

Use WASD to walk and F to talk to characters, press F again to continue interview and hold F down to speed up text. Right click to interact with doors.
